      • addData

        public void addData(String tableName,
           ArrayList<Double> doubleValues,
           ArrayList<String[]> values,
           String filename)
             throws DatabaseException
        Adds data efficiently with prepared statement. TODO: possible futher optimizations: - it is not neccessary any more to really store the ground values. In principle, one could directly read the GroundValues file, efficiently create db files and read them in afterwards.
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name of the table where the data should be added.
        doubleValues - [optional] double values to add, if any.
        values - normal string values to add.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException
        ReadOrWriteToFileException
